title: Carrie
itunes:title: Carrie
itunes:subtitle: For the inaugural episode, the Losers go back to the very beginning with Stephen King’s 1974 debut novel, Carrie. Chapters include: New Introduction, Meet the Losers (4:18), History/Hook (18:30), Structure and Format (32:00), Heroes and Vil...
description:
For the inaugural episode, the Losers go back to the very beginning with Stephen King’s 1974 debut novel, Carrie. 


Chapters include: New Introduction, Meet the Losers (4:18), History/Hook (18:30), Structure and Format (32:00), Heroes and Villains (42:00), The Sematary (1:05:00), Poundcake! (1:15:00), Final Thoughts (1:21:35), King’s Dominion (1:29:00), Adaptations (1:35:00), and Outro (2:16:00). 


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
